short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a handy button to copy Jira ticket IDs to your clipboard. Think of the hours saved!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a handy button on Jira tickets to copy the ticket ID to your clipboard. Currently only available on the "Active sprints" tab.
